title: Preseason 2020 Gameplay: Rise of the Elements

replies.body: These new bushes reminding me of the good old season 4 days

Jungle XP isn't the problem.
The lack of jg XP results in the gank meta we have currently. nerfing JG xp will only make this worse as jglers will have zero reason to do anything but gank
Love the changes! These changes are the things that are keeping the game alive, so it is sad to see people hating on them. Without it, there would be no consistant player base.
you would expect them to hate after they have tried it not after reading about it...
36 Rune shards where? Where my quints at? Also why are we reducing the xp of jg and bot so only top lane dictates the game?
if they raise solo xp then wouldnt mid also get a buff?
All very good sure but what are those alcoves? They don't help at all, they will be your graves.

Right.

Cloud and Mountain Dragon Souls are absolute cancer.
You're making every champion into Ezreal and expecting that to not break the game? The fuck is wrong with Riot? And the bonus ultimate cdr is going to render Ultimate Hunter irrelevant, congrats yet again.

Elder Drag execution is bullshit. It will instantly override Baron as the most important objective, because it will essentially reduce the health of the entire opposing team by a significant amount. Fantastically game breaking stuff introduced without solving the old problems. This seems to be a pattern, you guys.

Toplane impact - the problem isn't a lack of XP, the problem is junglers deciding toplane, ranged cheese being overpowered, and mages being the superior class against both tanks and bruisers.
Removing true damage from Conqueror is going to kill bruisers, and tanks aren't going to be played anyway, because their itemization against magic damage is shit.
At least Klepto is less annyoing, even if ranged cheese itself didn't get fully nerfed. It's something.
